Comments_List:
- how to read a lot of material and absorb it in one week 
- comprehensive review of m.e historiography

I developed significant insights into the varied approaches to my field's major historical questions. Most importantly, my perspective on the field of Middle East history was substantially broadened and consistently challenged.

The strenghts of this course were by far the professor's consistent insights.

I would appreciate more pre-formed questions to consider of each reading given that they are seminal works representing our field's major contributions.
Yes, if they are willing to put in the work and are really invested in middle eastern history
Absolutely, Professor Bsheer is an incredible educator who has a clear command of the field's literature.
